AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jason Cox: officer involved in the traffic stop, engaged in a cooperative conversation with Saldana
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: driver of the truck and trailer, answered questions from Haston and Cox, showed signs of nervousness but denied presence of drugs
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston: narcotics investigator who asked Saldana many questions, became more aggressive as suspicions grew, applied pressure to elicit cooperation
